definition: to sketch from nature/to do a still life drawing
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: The portrait is drawn from the life.
This time we went to another side of Nam Sang Wai for sketching. This house is a small restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 今次到了另一个景写生，这个排屋是间茶餐厅。

sentences.english: He resumed painting secretly, and went sketching in Zhongshan Park, painting flower-and-bird volumes.
sentences.chinese: 开始悄悄作画，去中山公园写生，作花鸟册页等。

sentences.english: An exhibition of the ink sketches of Li Keran is held in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 李可染水墨写生画展在北京举办。

sentences.english: She picks up her sketchbook and retrieves the charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起了了她的写生本和画笔。

sentences.english: The first element that we'll create is a sketchbook.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉握住她的写生簿和一支铅笔，开始写和画。

sentences.english: Fast recording is mainly used in life painting, so completed works are quite limited.
sentences.chinese: 写生时多以快速记录的一种方式，完整的作品比较少。

sentences.english: This picture that you've sketched isn't like her. The face is too elongated.
sentences.chinese: 你的这张写生画不象她，脸画得太长了。

sentences.english: You can not learn to paint without endlessly painting still lifes. Math is no different.
sentences.chinese: 没有日复一日的静物写生，你就不能够学会绘画。

sentences.english: There aren ' t many theories about landscape sketching in ancient china.
sentences.chinese: 在中国历代画论中，论及山水画写生的不多。

sentences.english: Welcome to join artist Yugong in sketching while walking through world.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎您加入艺术人余工边走边画的世界建筑写生行列。

sentences.english: Did you paint the picture from nature?
Make diagrams of each diorama with labeled sketches.
sentences.chinese: 使图表的每一个西洋镜与标记写生。

sentences.english: Sarah took her sketchbook and a pencil and started to draw and write.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉握住她的写生簿和一支铅笔，开始写和画。

sentences.english: Add a Drop Shadow to the sketchbook using a simple layer style.
sentences.chinese: 添加阴影的写生使用简单的图层样式。

definition: to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
